text: Batuhan'ın Aslıhan'ı kaçırdığı mağarayı öğrendim efendim.
english: I've found out the location of the cave where Batuhan kidnapped Aslıhan, sir.

text: Bizden başka kimse bilmiyor. Eminsin değil mi?
english: Nobody else knows except us. Are you sure ?

text: Ama mağaraya gidip onu kurtarmazsak ya açlıktan ölür ya da susuzluktan.
english: But if we don't go to the cave and rescue him, he will either die of hunger or thirst.

text: Belki de vahşi bir hayvan işini bitirir.
english: Perhaps a wild animal will finish the job.
Emir Sadeddin. For now, it suits me that

text: Emir Sadeddin'in nişanlısının yaşaması şimdilik işime gelir.

english: Let's see if His Highness the Emir...

text: ...Aslıhan Hatun için sulhu feda edecek mi?

english: This emblem is the emblem of the Çavdar Obası tribe.

text: Bu at belli ki Aslıhan Hatun'a aittir.
english: This horse obviously belongs to Aslıhan Hatun.

text: Belli ki bu dağın yamacındaki mağaralardan birinde saklanırlar.
english: They are obviously hiding in one of the caves on the side of this mountain.

text: Ben gidip Ertuğrul Bey'ime haber edeyim. Sen de iz aramaya devam et.
english: I'll go and inform Ertuğrul Bey. You keep searching too.

text: Beyine isyan töremizde yoktur Ural Bey.
english: Rebellion against the brain is not in our tradition, Mr. Ural.

text: Bilesiniz ki ne menzilinize baş koyarım ne de yemin ederim.
english: Know this: I will neither lay down my life nor swear an oath to reach your destination .

text: Elini vicdanına koyup bu hırsından vazgeçesin Ural Bey.
english: Put your hand on your conscience and give up this greed, Mr. Ural. May you pave the way for

text: Ganimetten gözü dönen beylere takvanın, güzel ahlakın yolunu açasın ki…
english: piety and good morals for the lords whose eyes are blinded by greed… so that
you may become the honor of the rye. You're on the
You will all bring disaster to our tribe.
(Sound of a dagger being plunged) Ah!

text: İmparatordan çekindiği için savaşı kendi çıkaramaz.
english: He cannot start a war himself because he fears the emperor. It's
They expect us to start the war.

text: Lakin Aslıhan Hatun'u kurtarmak için isteğini kabul eder görünmelisin.
english: But to save Aslıhan Hatun, you must pretend to agree to her request.

text: Aslıhan Hatun'un nerede olduğunu bilen biri varsa o da Vasilius'tur.
english: If anyone knows where Aslıhan Hatun is, it's Vasilius.
My Alps followed in the footsteps of Aslıhan Hatun.

text: Nerede olduğunu az çok tahmin ederler.
english: They have a pretty good idea where he is.
he will send his soldiers to take Aslıhan Hatun.

text: O askerler de bizi Aslıhan Hatun'a götürecektir.
english: Those soldiers will also take us to Aslıhan Hatun . I'm
You made me very happy, Helena. I
only have one request from you.

text: Eğer bir daha kaleye gelirse o zaman istediğin gibi cezalandırırsın.
english: If he comes to the castle again, then you can punish him however you want.
(Sound of door opening) (Sound of door creaking)
I knew it, I knew it would come.

text: Bu, bu adama aldırmayasın, aldırmayasın bu adama.
english: Don't pay attention to this man, don't pay attention to this man. He
I spoke with the governor Vasilius. He

text: Bilirdim, bilirdim bu sıçan deliğinde beni bırakmayacağını.
english: I knew it, I knew he wouldn't leave me in this rat hole .

text: Sana söylemem gereken bir şey daha var.
english: There's one more thing I need to tell you.
You will never come to the castle again.
What won't I do? You will never come to

text: Bir daha kaleye de, beni görmeye de gelmeyeceksin.
english: the castle again, nor will you come to see me again.

text: Gün batmadan gelip, Hanlı Pazar'ı teslim alasın.
english: Come and take over Hanlı Bazaar before sunset .

text: Sulh için uzun uzun sohbet eder, yemek yeriz.
english: long conversations and a meal together to make peace .

text: Emir Sadeddin, şimdi yularını tuttum işte.
english: Emir Sadeddin, now I have your reins in hand .

text: O yuları bir kez tuttum ya...
english: Once I've got hold of that reins...
...you'll kneel before me and beg. I will make you lick

text: Türklerin kanıyla kirlenen çizmelerimi sana yalatacağım, yalatacağım.
english: my boots, stained with the blood of the Turks , I will make you lick them.

text: O Hanlı Pazar Türklerin de, Ertuğrul'un da sonu olacak.
english: That Hanli Bazaar will be the end of both the Turks and Ertuğrul.

text: Bu eller, benim gördüğüm en kutsal silahlar.
english: These hands are the most sacred weapons I have ever seen.
I give you your first task?
(Vasilius) I will need him. You were
They are going to pick up Aslıhan.
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah...

text: ...ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlü.
english: ...and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

text: Birazdan Aslıhan da burada olacak efendim.
english: Aslıhan will be here shortly, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Hanlı Pazar'ı elinden aldığım için her türlü deliliği yapacaktır.
english: Ertuğrul Hanlı will do all sorts of crazy things because I took the market from him.
He'll give me what I want on a silver platter.
So be careful. Yes sir, please

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imle Emir Hazretleri sizi bekler Tekfur Vasilius.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and His Highness the Emir await you, Tekfur Vasilius.

text: Duydum ki Emir Sadeddin'le alışveriş etmek istemişsin...
english: I heard you wanted to do business with Emir Sadeddin...

text: Ben de seni pazarımın terazisinde tartmak istedim.
english: I too wanted to weigh you on the scales of my marketplace.
Let's see how much your honor is worth.

state's orders to further your schemes .

text: Anladım ki evvela senin şerefini değil...

judged first... ...but your intelligence. You'll see

text: Aklımın da, şerefimin de kaç okka çektiğini göreceksin.
english: how much my mind and my honor weigh. You have destroyed
...and the love in the heart, Vasilius. The time has come to speak to

text: Seninle şerefli bir komutan gibi değil...
english: you not like an honorable commander...

text: ...hele hele bir Tekfur gibi hiç değil...
english: ...and certainly not like a Byzantine governor... ...but like a common bandit

text: ...seninle adi bir haydut gibi konuşmanın vakti geldi.
O halde kaleme kadar gelip benimle yaptığın...
english: So let's begin to discuss the secret deals you made with me,
Emir Sadeddin, that you came all the way here to write about.
Emir Sadeddin met with you alone... ...
for the benefit of the Seljuk State.
You made a deal with me for Aslıhan. You gave

text: Daha nerede olduğunu dahi bilmediğin nişanlının...

english: me Hanlı Bazaar in exchange for the life of your fiancée, whose whereabouts you don't even know yet.
Hanlı Bazaar belongs to the Kayı tribe.
If you have the power, you fight and you take it.
You cannot take the inn with your games if you cannot take it with your sword, Vasilius.
I've come to get what's rightfully mine, and I will get it.
You have come here to die, Vasilius.
no easy death for you, Turk. Put him on the horse

text: Bamsı'yı bir kere daha görmek istiyorsan, o kılıcı...
english: to see Bamsı one more time ,
Ertuğrul Bey, you will put that sword back in its sheath. Ah!
you think I was so foolish as to not realize you could trap me?
Ha? Of course I took precautions.

text: Emir Sadeddin, Ertuğrul'la birlik olup bana tuzak kurabilir.
english: Emir Sadeddin might team up with Ertuğrul and set a trap for me.

text: O Türk benim hayatımın teminatı olacak.
english: That Turk will be the guarantor of my life. You will wait in the

text: Şeytan bile kıskanır seni Tekfur Vasilius.
english: Even the devil would envy you, Tekfur Vasilius.
Kill me, you bald bastard! Ah!
(Bamsi) Ah! Kill me, you bald bastard!

text: Kahpe oyunlarınız seni de, devletini de daha fazla yaşatamayacak Vasilius.
english: Your treacherous games will not allow you or your state to live much longer, Vasilius.
Give me this, and you'll get Bamsi.
Turgut, bring Bamsı with you. At

text: O kelleni Karacahisar Kalesi'nin surlarında sallandıracağım.
english: I will hang your head from the walls of Karacahisar Castle.

text: Kutluca cesedi buldu, Aliyar cana geldi.
english: Kutluca found the body, Aliyar came back to life.
What do you intend to do, sir? We're completely trapped
Mr. Ural became who he is today... it's because he never gave up
he never begged for mercy from anyone.
These dark clouds hanging over us...

text: Ama sen hatunum olarak yeise düşmeyesin.
english: But you, my wife, must not despair.

text: Benim gidip derhal Emir Sadeddin'le görüşmem gerek.
english: I need to go and meet with Emir Sadeddin immediately .
My lord, I was at Hanlı Bazaar as per your order.
Once again, there was bloodshed at the inn.

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Emir Hazretleri bir olup...
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Emir Hazretleri, acting together, ...

text: Sonra Alpler, Vasilius ve komutanını götürdüler.
english: Then the Alps carried Vasilius and his commander away.

text: Bamsı Alp'i rehin almış derler beyim.

in exchange for the life of Bamsı .

text: Bu ne menem bir iştir Çolpan!
english: What kind of mess is this, Çolpan!
Where are you going, sir? To
I said our wedding should be in the palace.
I wanted our Sultan to get to know you.

Highness. If it were up to

after the feast with the Turkmen chieftains

text: Buna en çok ben sevindim Aslıhan.
english: I'm the happiest about this, Aslıhan.
It came from our Sultan, Your Highness.
be able to witness our wedding, Aslıhan?
Our Sultan urgently summons me to his side.

How am I going to get all this work done? Do
n't you worry at all, sir.

text: Biz akşama kadar hepsini hazır ederiz.

text: Beyler geldiklerinde hak ettikleri gibi ağırlanır evlat.

n't worry. All I want is for my son

Son, don't be angry with Bamsi.
He doesn't know what he's doing.
His love has driven him out of his mind.

text: İmdi yapılacak her zaafın bedeli ağır olur.

text: Hayme Ana, ben de elimden geleni yapmak isterim.

(Hayme) We will overcome this, God willing.
Thank God you're back. Now that

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Aliyar Bey!

english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Aliyar Bey!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Aliyar Bey!

text: Şarabı fazla kaçırıp kendinden geçmezsin umarım.
english: I hope you don't drink too much wine and pass out.
Well, our commander-in-chief is getting married.
We are their closest commanders. If we're not going to get

text: Bugün sarhoş olmayacağız da ne vakit olacağız?
english: drunk today, when will we ? So

text: O halde kendine şimdiden seni taşıyacak birini bul.
english: find someone to carry you now.

text: Ne oldu ihtiyar, ne bu hâl?
english: What happened, old man, what's wrong?

text: De hele Dündar, hayır mı, şer mi?
english: Dündar, is it good or bad?
Auntie, I saw a woman. She

text: Elinde tepsiyle az evvel içeri girdi.
english: just came in with a tray in her hand.

text: Ben sorar soruşturur, kimdir, neyin nesidir öğrenir, sana derim.
english: I'll inquire, find out who he is and what he's like, and then I'll tell you. Thank you.
Hopefully everything will turn out for the best, Dündar.
(Music) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the

text: Kilimhanede ne kadar becerikli olduklarını görmüştük...

english: the women of Çavdar were in the carpet workshop.

text: Lakin sofra donatmakta da pek bir mahirmişler.
english: But they were also very skilled at setting the table. May it bring

text: İnşallah Banıçiçek Hatun'un desteğiyle bundan gayrı genç hatunlarımız...
english: Hopefully, with the support of Banıçiçek Hatun, our young women will
be better educated from now on. Our

text: Gayrı obamız senin obandır Banıçiçek Hatun.
english: tribe is now your tribe, Banıçiçek Hatun. Thank you so much,

text: Dündar Bey'imin gönlüne bir sevda düşmüş.
english: Dündar Bey has fallen in love.

text: Lakin Dündar Bey'im adının Günyeli olduğunu dedi.
english: But Mr. Dündar said his name was Günyeli. She was among

text: Bu akşam hizmet eden hatunlar arasındaymış.
...her daim Ural'dan yana olan Acar Bey'in kızıdır.
english: ... is the daughter of Acar Bey, who has always sided with the Urals.
you grow old together on the same pillow.
My cousin Helena is a lucky woman. She'll

text: Sizin gibi cesur bir adamla evlenecek.
english: marry a brave man like you.
Vasilius brought me back to life.
I was withdrawn from life for a long time.

text: Ee, bu kötü günlerin konuşmalarını bir kenara bırakalım ha?
english: Okay, let's put aside these bad times for a moment, shall we?
... to what do we owe your visit here?
Ertuğrul and Köpek formed an alliance. You
want to do it with me too.
But I couldn't choose my friends.
Well, you're progressing on the path to wisdom.
In exchange for my principality... I offer the
n't make me laugh, Mr. Ural. You

text: Sen obanda hayat hakkı bulamamışsın, bir de beylik peşindesin.
english: couldn't even find a place to live in your own community, and now you're aspiring to be a chieftain .
Three of our commanders were killed.
The bodies are in the courtyard.
He is the one who denies the Urals... ...the right to life.

text: Yenge, ne oldu? Bir haber var mı?
O kız, Ural'ın sağ kolu olan Acar Bey'in kızıdır.
english: That girl is the daughter of Acar Bey, Ural's right-hand man.

text: (Halime) Acar Bey'in bu işe gönlü olmaz.

english: ...has set his sights on your castle...

text: İnşallah zafer bizim olacaktır Aliyar Bey.
english: God willing, victory will be ours, Mr. Aliyar.
We will strike the enemy in their own lair.
...one cannot take revenge on a Turk...
(Ertuğrul) All our enemies will know that...
...the call to prayer will never cease in these lands.
flag will not be lowered. The

text: ...bu topraklarda ilahi nizam her yere yayılacak.
english: ...divine order will spread everywhere in these lands.
